metadata.title: CVE-2018-14603 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before10.8.7, 11.0.x before 11.0.5, and 11.1.x before 11.1.2. CSRF can occur inthe Test feature of the System Hooks component.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
